content:
Warby Parker often offers promotions and discounts for first-time customers, especially for home try-on orders.

**Current Deals and Promo Codes:**

As of my knowledge cutoff, Warby Parker is offering the following deals and promo codes:

1. **Free Home Try-On**: Warby Parker always offers free home try-on for first-time customers. You can try up to 5 frames at home for free, with free shipping both ways.
2. **15% Off First Purchase**: Use promo code WPNEW15 at checkout to get 15% off your first purchase, including home try-on orders. This code is valid for new customers only.
3. **Buy One, Get One Free**: Warby Parker occasionally runs a "Buy One, Get One Free" promotion on select frames. Keep an eye on their website or social media for these limited-time offers.
4. **Student Discount**: Warby Parker offers a 15% discount for students with a valid .edu email address. You can sign up for their student program on their website.
5. **Refer a Friend**: Refer a friend to Warby Parker and get $30 off your next purchase when they make a purchase. Your friend will also get $30 off their first purchase.

**Other Ways to Save:**

1. **Insurance Discounts**: Warby Parker accepts many insurance plans, which can help you save on your purchase.
2. **Warby Parker Credit**: If you're a frequent customer, you can earn Warby Parker credit by referring friends or purchasing glasses. You can redeem this credit on future purchases.
3. **Sales and Clearance**: Warby Parker occasionally puts select frames on sale or clearance. Keep an eye on their website for these deals.

**Tips:**

1. Always check Warby Parker's website for current promotions and promo codes before making a purchase.
2. Sign up for their email newsletter to stay informed about new deals and promotions.
3. Follow Warby Parker on social media to catch limited-time offers and flash sales.

Remember to always read the terms and conditions for each promo code or deal to ensure you understand the requirements and limitations.
